A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Subversive\, thoughtful\, and most of all\, surprising. The film is fresh\, socially relevant and exciting\, but not without flaws. The film suffers from pacing issues and the occasional confusing character beat\, but as a complete piece of cinema\, it is an artist's singular vision. Rian Johnson made the movie he wanted to. This is what happens when you give a true artist a big budget - the result is often a mess\, but it is a mess that is full of emotion\, hope and pure cinematic flare. Star Wars is fresh again. The universe is blown wide open and I can't wait to see what happens next. Well done\, Rian Johnson.
